task.name: g.gui.vdigit
task.description: Interactive editing and digitization of vector maps.
task.keywords: general, user interface, GUI, vector, editing, digitizer

parameter.name: map
parameter.label: Name of vector map to edit
parameter.description: Or data source for direct OGR access

flag.name: c
flag.description: Create new vector map if doesn't exist
